titles: Proedria vasilikÄ“ a discourse concerning the precedency of kings : wherin the reasons and arguments of the three greatest monarks of Christendom, who claim a several right therunto, are faithfully collected, and renderd : wherby occasion is taken to make Great Britain better understood then [sic] some forren authors (either out of ignorance or interest) have represented her in order to this particular : whereunto is also adjoyned a distinct Treatise of ambassadors &c.
author: Howell, James, 1594?-1666.
publisher: Printed by Ja. Cottrel, for Sam. Speed ..., and Chr. Eccleston ...,
notes: Dedication "To His Majesty" [Charles II] signed: J. Howel.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
keywords: Great Britain --  Kings and rulers --  Early works to 1800.
